message: {"meta": null, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Content type application/json; charset=utf-8 cannot be simplified to markdown, but here is the raw content:\nContents of https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408644329:\nhe widget's position. It removes the old widget, lets `createFeedWidget` append the new one to the end of the grid, and then moves the new widget to the original's position.\\n\\n```javascript\\n                    const nextSibling = widget.nextSibling;\\n                    widget.remove();\\n                    createFeedWidget(result); // This appends the new widget to the end of the grid.\\n                    const newWidget = feedGrid.lastChild;\\n                    // Move the new widget back to the original's position.\\n                    feedGrid.insertBefore(newWidget, nextSibling);\\n```\",\"created_at\":\"2025-10-06T21:22:22Z\",\"updated_at\":\"2025-10-06T21:22:22Z\",\"html_url\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/88#discussion_r2408644329\",\"pull_request_url\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/88\",\"author_association\":\"CONTRIBUTOR\",\"_links\":{\"self\":{\"href\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408644329\"},\"html\":{\"href\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/88#discussion_r2408644329\"},\"pull_request\":{\"href\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/88\"}},\"reactions\":{\"url\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408644329/reactions\",\"total_count\":0,\"+1\":0,\"-1\":0,\"laugh\":0,\"hooray\":0,\"confused\":0,\"heart\":0,\"rocket\":0,\"eyes\":0},\"start_line\":655,\"original_start_line\":655,\"start_side\":\"RIGHT\",\"line\":656,\"original_line\":656,\"side\":\"RIGHT\",\"original_position\":144,\"position\":144,\"subject_type\":\"line\"}", "annotations": null}], "isError": false}

content: {"meta": null, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Content type application/json; charset=utf-8 cannot be simplified to markdown, but here is the raw content:\nContents of https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408644329:\nhe widget's position. It removes the old widget, lets `createFeedWidget` append the new one to the end of the grid, and then moves the new widget to the original's position.\\n\\n```javascript\\n                    const nextSibling = widget.nextSibling;\\n                    widget.remove();\\n                    createFeedWidget(result); // This appends the new widget to the end of the grid.\\n                    const newWidget = feedGrid.lastChild;\\n                    // Move the new widget back to the original's position.\\n                    feedGrid.insertBefore(newWidget, nextSibling);\\n```\",\"created_at\":\"2025-10-06T21:22:22Z\",\"updated_at\":\"2025-10-06T21:22:22Z\",\"html_url\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/88#discussion_r2408644329\",\"pull_request_url\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/88\",\"author_association\":\"CONTRIBUTOR\",\"_links\":{\"self\":{\"href\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408644329\"},\"html\":{\"href\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/88#discussion_r2408644329\"},\"pull_request\":{\"href\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/88\"}},\"reactions\":{\"url\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408644329/reactions\",\"total_count\":0,\"+1\":0,\"-1\":0,\"laugh\":0,\"hooray\":0,\"confused\":0,\"heart\":0,\"rocket\":0,\"eyes\":0},\"start_line\":655,\"original_start_line\":655,\"start_side\":\"RIGHT\",\"line\":656,\"original_line\":656,\"side\":\"RIGHT\",\"original_position\":144,\"position\":144,\"subject_type\":\"line\"}", "annotations": null}], "isError": false}
